name: Black Sesame Milk Tea
description: Taste the mystique of roasted sesame in a milky blend! Dive deep into the luscious, velvety flavor of an ancient seed.

name: Brown Sugar Milk Tea
description: Indulge in the caramelized goodness of brown sugar. A nostalgic sip that'll remind you of sweet childhood memories!

name: Honeydew Milk Tea
description: Experience a refreshing splash of summer with every sip! Honeydew's subtle sweetness is a dream in creamy liquid form.

name: Jasmine Milk Tea
description: Elegance in a cup! Let the fragrant allure of jasmine blossoms whisk you away on an aromatic journey.

name: Lychee Milk Tea
description: Tropical delight! Dance to the rhythm of island vibes with the exotic taste of lychee pearls.

name: Mango Milk Tea
description: A tropical treasure! Dive into the sun-kissed sweetness of ripe mangoes, blended to perfection.

name: Matcha Green Tea
description: Awaken your senses! Dive into the earthy richness of matcha, a timeless Japanese classic.

name: Strawberry Milk Tea
description: A rosy rendezvous! Sip on the pure, sweet essence of farm-fresh strawberries and cream.

name: Taro Milk Tea
description: A sip of purple magic! Let the creamy, nutty flavors of taro transport you to a realm of flavor fantasy.

name: Thai Milk Tea
description: A journey to Thailand in a cup! Embrace the rich and creamy symphony of spices and sweetness.
